verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had let him <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> when he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> him being <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H246>chains<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> all the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who were carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

The <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> on this <S%H4725>place;<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H6213>it,<s%> and done according as he <S%H1696>spoke:<s%> because you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> therefore this thing has come on <S%H1697>you.<s%>

<S%H6605>Now,<s%> behold, I release you this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H246>chains<s%> which are on your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> If it seems <S%H2896>good<s%> to you to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will take <S%H7760>care<s%> of <S%H7489>you;<s%> but if it seems bad to you to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H2308>don<s%>'t: <S%H7200>behold,<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H413>you;<s%> where it seems <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> to you to <S%H3212>go,<s%> there <S%H3212>go.<s%>

Now while he had not yet gone <S%H7725>back,<s%> Go <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1436>then,<s%> he said, to Gedaliah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> or <S%H3212>go<s%> wherever it seems <S%H3477>right<s%> to you to <S%H3212>go.<s%> So the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H737>food<s%> and a <S%H4864>present,<s%> and let him <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now when all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> who were in the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> even they and their <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had made <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H6485>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and had <S%H6485>committed<s%> to him <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> and <S%H2945>children,<s%> and of the <S%H1803>poorest<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> of those who were not carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8576>Tanhumeth,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5778>Ephai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4602>Maacathite,<s%> they and their <S%H582>men.<s%>

<S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them and to their <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> dwell <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and it shall be well with <S%H3190>you.<s%>

As for <S%H3427>me,<s%> behold, I will dwell at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> before the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H622>us:<s%> but you, gather <S%H3196>wine<s%> and summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in your <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> that you have <S%H8610>taken.<s%>

Likewise when all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were in <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and among the children of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and in <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and who were in all the <S%H776>countries,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H5414>left<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and that he had <S%H6485>set<s%> over them <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan;<s%>

then all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> returned <S%H7725>out<s%> of all <S%H4725>places<s%> where they were <S%H5080>driven,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> who were in the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3045>him,<s%> Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H1185>Baalis<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> to <S%H5221>take<s%> your <S%H1436>life?<s%> But Gedaliah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe them.

Then <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> <S%H5643>secretly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Please let me <S%H3212>go,<s%> and I will <S%H5221>kill<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5221>it:<s%> why should he take your <S%H3064>life,<s%> that all the Jews who are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> to you should be <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6>perish?<s%>

But <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing;<s%> for you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael.<s%>
